title: [Large-Scale] Enhancing Language Teachers’ Collaborative Design Capabilities Through TPD Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool utilization skills and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Process for in-service language teachers to develop collaborative learning design competencies for students by applying gamification elements based on the 4Ts theory

learning_goals: Learners achieve sustained participation (≥80%) in teacher professional development (TPD) activities by utilizing gamification mechanisms (e.g., experience points, badges, leaderboards).
Learners complete a collaborative learning design project for students by applying the 4Ts theory with 100% completion and earn at least 4 points (out of 5) via peer evaluation.
Learners apply knowledge/skills acquired in a gamified environment to actual lesson design at least three times and submit case reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
